page.title: 10HEALTH:COMMUNITY HOSPITAL
page.content: he{Community Hospital}Wallingford was the first in the UK.Doctors,district nurses and midwives have a{health} centre here.You can get medicines here and see a consultant from Oxford or Reading,the school dentist, physiotherapist,radiographer and occupational therapist.Old people come here every day.They make things and have their hair and feet looked after. ST.Leonard's ward is for old people to live or come for short stays.The oldest is nearly 100.ST.John's ward is for very ill people.In ST.George's ward there were 3 new babies and their mothers.They were born here but some come from Oxford or Reading for a few days after they are born.
